PHP code

<?php
$array = array(
    "foo" => "bar",
    "bar" => "foo",
);

// depuis PHP 5.4
$array = [
    "foo" => "bar",
    "bar" => "foo",
];
?>

Ruby code

# Let the user guess.
print "Enter heads or tails? "
hort = gets.chomp
unless hort == 'heads' || hort == 'tails' 
    print "I _said_ heads or tails.  Can't you read?\n"
    exit(1)
end

# Now toss the coin.
toss = if rand(2) == 1 then
    "heads"
else
    "tails"
end

# Report.
print "Toss was ", toss, ".\n"
print "You Win!\n" if hort == toss

C code

#include <stdio.h>

int main()
{
    int year;

    printf("Enter a year: ");
    scanf("%d",&year);

    if(year%4 == 0)
    {
        if( year%100 == 0)
        {
            // year is divisible by 400, hence the year is a leap year
            if ( year%400 == 0)
                printf("%d is a leap year.", year);
            else
                printf("%d is not a leap year.", year);
        }
        else
            printf("%d is a leap year.", year );
    }
    else
        printf("%d is not a leap year.", year);
    
    return 0;
}
